channel.title: Battlefield 2 torrent: Please insert installation disc =(
channel.description: Well ummmh, I burned the battlefield 2 torrent .iso on a disc and installed it to my computer. But unfortunately when trying to start it's telling me to insert the installation disc to play, so the burned iso is not enough. Any tip?

item.title: Battlefield 2 torrent: Please insert installation disc =(
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

R.I.P RSC:

If you dl a good torrent it comes with a crack. I don’t know what dl speeds you have with torrents and what provider you have but try newsservers for a while. They are way faster then torrents (for me) and constant speeds.

Wow, I haven’t heard of anyone else using newsservers to get their files in quite a while
What client do you use? I used to use xnews, but I haven’t had time to get on in quite a while.

item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

io9:

Buy the game? It’s worth $10USD at Best Buy…

I’m clairvoyant.

<~Ikiliki[God]> I bet some person replies <~Ikiliki[God]> 'Just buy it in the shop'
I'd buy it, but unfortunately the shops here don't have it anymore because no one was ever buying them, and they don't want to order new ones. I don't feel like ordering it from some American or English shop and wait weeks until I actually have it.

Edit: Nevermind, a friend of my mother works at a dutch selling site, he’s going to give me one this week for my upcoming birthday loll
